text: Good morning everyone ! I'm working on my project and I was wondering whether there is an alternative method to check bet status (whether it was won, lost or null) other than the Exchange API. Something like a external provider API that given a sport event, a market and a selection, tells us the outcome. Thanks ! :wink:
